Class Client

java.lang.Object
grab.szan.Client
public class Client extends Object
Represents a client that connects to the game server. Manages input/output streams, the socket connection, and command handling.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public boolean start()
      Starts the client by attempting to connect to the server. Spawns a new thread to listen for messages from the server.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is successful, false otherwise

    • sendToServer

      public void sendToServer(String msg)
      Sends a message to the server.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to send

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the current ID of this client.
      Returns:
      the client's ID

    • setId

      public void setId(int id)
      Sets the client's ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the new ID

    • getRoomName

      public String getRoomName()
      Gets the current room name.
      Returns:
      the room name

    • setRoomName

      public void setRoomName(String roomName)
      Sets the current room name.
      Parameters:
      roomName - the new room name

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Gets the client's nickname.
      Returns:
      the nickname

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the client's nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the new nickname

    • createClient

      public static void createClient(String host, int port)
      Creates a new client instance if one does not already exist. Otherwise, retains the existing instance.
      Parameters:
      host - the server's host
      port - the server's port

    • getInstance

      public static Client getInstance() throws NullPointerException
      Retrieves the singleton client instance.
      Returns:
      the existing client instance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the instance does not exist
